abstract: Mount McKinley, North America's tallest mountain, is renamed Denali by Interior Sec Sally Jewell, settling long dispute between Alaska and Ohio, birthplace of peak's namesake Pres William McKinley; restoration of mountain's name comes just as Pres Obama travels to Alaska to highlight climate change's impact on Alaska Natives, fulfilling campaign promise to address grievances of Native Americans.
lead_paragraph: On the eve of his visit to Alaska, President Obama announced the restoration of the Alaska Native name for the tallest peak in North America.

headline.main: Mount McKinley Will Again Be Called Denali
headline.print_headline: North America’s Tallest Peak Will Again Be Called Denali

snippet: On the eve of his visit to Alaska, President Obama announced the restoration of the Alaska Native name for the tallest peak in North America.
